scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model via a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on the model's predictions, without direct access to the underlying dataset.
initial_goal: Develop a method to identify customers with a high probability of churn using only the deployed prediction API.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: Customer relationship management (CRM) system with a deployed machine learning model predicting customer churn probability based on sensitive customer data (income, spending habits, etc.).
